title: Hand Painted Eden
alternative_title: Tengaki no Eden ; てがきのエデン
status: Tengaki no Eden ; てがきのエデン
description:
Description :
        After graduating from high school, Minori decides to attend an art school against her mother's protests. While throwing herself into her work, she happens to meet two fellow male students. Fujioka Takashi and Kagami Touma. Kagami, who uplifts people with his confidence and kindness. Fujioka, whose confidence inspires. Thanks to these two boys, Minori is able to overcome the struggles she's been facing her entire life. But what happens when one of them wants something more?
